feed.title: Friends make the worst enemies
feed.subtitle: A Bootstrap 4 start up project for Jekyll and Github Pages

entry.title: Heath Ledger
entry.content: “Everyone you meet always asks if you have a career, are married, or own a house as if life was some kind of grocery list. But no one ever asks you if you are happy.”
entry.summary: “Everyone you meet always asks if you have a career, are married, or own a house as if life was some kind of grocery list. But no one ever asks you if you are happy.”

entry.title: House of Cards
entry.content: “For those of us climbing to the top of the food chain, there is but one rule; hunt or be hunted.”
entry.summary: “For those of us climbing to the top of the food chain, there is but one rule; hunt or be hunted.”

entry.title: Unknown
entry.content: “We have empty conversation filled with empty words with most people. And when those who come along whose words are filled with life, love, and wonderment, we notice them that much more, so that we will never let them go.”
entry.summary: “We have empty conversation filled with empty words with most people. And when those who come along whose words are filled with life, love, and wonderment, we notice them that much more, so that we will never let them go.”

entry.title: Oscar Wilde
entry.content: “A bore is someone who deprives you of solitude without providing you with company.”
entry.summary: “A bore is someone who deprives you of solitude without providing you with company.”
